summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing acquisition of properties in Kiwanis Ravine; authorizing a grant agreement with the State of Washington's Interagency Committee for Outdoor Recreation; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Shoreline Park Improvement Fund and an appropriation from the Community Improvement Fund to pay for the authorized Kiwanis ravine acquisitions; and making an appropriation from the Shoreline Park Improvement fund for pre-acqusition activities for the Seaboard Lumber and 3701 Beach Drive South projects.
